sentences.en: Gessler ruled over Switzerland. The Swiss people hated him.
sentences.cn: 盖斯勒统治着瑞士, 瑞士人都痛恨他.

sentences.en: He declared his new Swiss watch and had to pay ￡.5.
sentences.cn: 他申报了新买的瑞士表并纳税5英镑.

sentences.en: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.cn: 我正吃夹火腿和瑞士干酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.en: Investors would do well to take a look at the Swiss economy.
sentences.cn: 投资者应该关注一下瑞士的经济。

sentences.en: Swiss fans cheered Jakob Hlasek during yesterday's match with Courier.
sentences.cn: 昨天，瑞士球迷在雅各布·赫拉塞克对阵库里耶的比赛中为赫拉塞克喝彩加油。

sentences.en: Swiss unemployment rose to the still modest rate of 0.7%.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的失业率上升到了0.7%，这个百分比仍然不算太高。

sentences.en: The company has gone into partnership with Swiss Bank Corporation.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已经和瑞士银行公司建立合作关系.

sentences.en: The main course was typically Swiss.
The report shows the Swiss are among the world's top wage earners.
sentences.cn: 报告显示瑞士人的工资收入位列世界最高水平。

sentences.en: The Swiss are Europe's biggest spenders on food.
sentences.cn: 瑞士人是欧洲人中在食品上开销最大的人群。

sentences.en: The Swiss economy is a case apart; unlike any other.
sentences.cn: 瑞士经济是个独特的例子, 不同于其他的经济形式.

sentences.en: The Swiss franc has remained surprisingly strong.
sentences.cn: 瑞士法郎一直出人意料地保持着坚挺。

sentences.en: The Swiss wanted to discourage an inflow of foreign money.
sentences.cn: 瑞士人想要阻止外资流入。

sentences.en: They were killed by an avalanche in the Swiss Alps.
sentences.cn: 他们在瑞士阿尔卑斯山的一次雪崩中罹难.

trans.tran_cn: （人）来自瑞士的，瑞士的，瑞士文化的
trans.tran_en: relating to Switzerland or its people
